decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed also existing Front Elevation with Neighbouring properties (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Rear Elevation (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Roof Plan (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Side Elevation (Alcove) (Feburary 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Section B-B (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Block Plan with Neighbouring properties (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Ground Floor Plan (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed First Floor Plan (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Proposed Rear Elevation with Neighbouring properties (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Existing and Proposed Block Plan with Neighbouring properties (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Existing Section B-B (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Existing Plans (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Existing and Proposed Site Plans (February 2023)
10 King Edwards gardens, London W3 9RG Existing Elevations (February 2023)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
